EmailTemplate.subject: Free Webcast - GoDirect™ Jet ConneX Service Plans
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
It’s no secret that streaming videos, downloading large files and watching live TV on an aircraft requires rock-solid Wi-Fi. But what enables that connectivity and how is it optimized?
Join our webcast on Wednesday, October 10 at 8:00 a.m. PT / 11:00 a.m. ET and find out how GoDirect and Jet ConneX service plan will enable passengers and flight crew to experience the revolutionary in-flight Wi-Fi for office and home-like connectivity in the sky. Our webcast will feature our technical experts.
Sign up for our webcast today!
REGISTER NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/GoDirect_Webinar.html]]>
